ingredients.ingredient: 8 jalapeno peppers, halved lengthwise and seeded

cookingTips: Use a small spoon or piping bag to fill jalapeno halves evenly with peanut butter
Ensure bacon is wrapped snugly to prevent it from sliding off during cooking
Bake at 400°F for 20-25 minutes until bacon is crispy and peppers are tender
enrichment.coachingPrompt: Guide the user through filling techniques and remind them of the sweet-savory-spicy flavor profile this creates.
